query: top 5 semiconductor stocks to invest in 2024 and their risks

results.title: NVIDIA's AI Chip Growth in 2024
results.content: NVIDIA continues to dominate the AI chip market with projected earnings growth of over 30%. Key risks include supply chain constraints and geopolitical tensions in Asia.

results.title: AMD Expands in Data Centers
results.content: AMD is aggressively targeting data center growth, aiming for a 20% YoY increase. Analysts warn of competition from Intel's new Xeon line.

results.title: TSMC's Global Fabrication Strategy
results.content: TSMC expands its manufacturing to Arizona, mitigating geopolitical risk and improving North American supply reliability.

results.title: Broadcom's Networking Edge
results.content: Broadcom leverages custom silicon to dominate enterprise networking. Challenges include integration risks from VMware acquisition.

results.title: Intel’s AI Comeback Plans
results.content: Intel bets big on Gaudi2 chips for AI workloads. Success hinges on ecosystem adoption and price-performance competitiveness.
